episodes.title: Don't get CAUGHT in this meditation TRAP
episodes.description:
A new method of meditation is being promoted on YouTube by Bhante Vimalaramsi (born Marvel Logan), Delson Armstrong, and David Johnson, who call themselves Suttavadins. Their method is called TWIM (Tranquil Wisdom Insight Meditation) and their home base is Dhamma Sukha Meditation Center. They claim that this practice takes one all the way to full Awakening (Enlightenment). But is this really true? And is it safe? We expose the truth about TWIM.

🎙️🎧 For those who wish to listen while on the go or those with sensory processing disorders who find music beds and sound effects interfere with their ability to attend to dialogue, a podcast mix of this presentation is now available on YouTube Music: 
👉🏽 https://music.youtube.com/watch?v=NH7STU-llkg

🧡 You can donate to show your appreciation & support on Ko-Fi:
👉🏽 https://ko-fi.com/BeingUntangled

🙏 Thanks to the following:
Ven.Thanissaro Bhikkhu, Ven. Ajahn Punnadhammo, Ven. Bhikkhu Sujato, Oleg Pavlov, Pavel Kataorgin, Rob Ellis, AJ Gentile, Casey Cavanaugh, and others who offered help, support and information.

📋Other Suttavadins:  Liam McClintock, Sister Khema, Doug Kraft, Andrew Litchy, and others.

📋Addendum 📋
• Sister Khema, who was still alive as this was being filmed, died of her cancer in September 2023.
• It is stated  that Pavel Katorgin is from Russia. He is actually from Kazakhstan.
